# yield_data

This project aims to collect and analyze data from B3 stock index.

```{r}
data_sample <- read.csv("data/yield_data.csv",
                        col.names = c("Symbol", "Year", "Stock Price", "Dividends", "Yield")) 

knitr::kable(head(data_sample, 20), digits = 2)
```
